#include <iostream>
#include <vector>

using namespace std;

int gcd(int a, int b){
	if(a == 0)
		return b;
	if(b == 0)
		return a;
	if(a > b){
		return gcd(a%b, b);
	}else{
		return gcd(a, b%a);
	}
}

int main(){
	int T;
	cin >> T;
	int N, M;
	int temp;
	while(T--){
		cin >> N >> M;
		temp = gcd(N,M);
		cout << temp*((M/temp)-1)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
